title: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 8, 2026: Testing 6% lows
full_text: Mortgage and refinance interest rates today, January 8, 2026: Testing 6% lows. These are today's mortgage and refinance interest rates, which are testing 6% lows. Shop multiple lenders and lock in your best mortgage rate today.. Mortgage rates are testing 6% lows in early 2026. According to Zillow, the average 30-year fixed mortgage rate today is 5.98%.
